grassmann::NullMatrixDiagException

grassmann::NullMatrixDiagException Class Reference

Exception raised when trying to triangularize or compute the determinant of a matrix that may be singular. More...

Detailed Description

Exception raised when trying to triangularize or compute the determinant of a matrix that may be singular.
